name: 乔纳森·查科
introduction: Jonathan is an actor, model, and voiceover artist with a bright and comedic personality. He takes weekly acting classes, both private and group, to continually grow in his talents. He is fluent in ASL and a top student, receiving the Principal's Award of Recognition and Honors.Jonathan can be found on the stage with his local musical theatre company, doing interesting science experiments, playing with his many Pokèmon cards, or volunteering in his community. During his free time, he enjoys making birthday cards for residents in Nursing Homes, plays the Ukulele and Piano, and continues to quickly move up the ranks in Karate. His work ethic and determination have given him opportunities to shine wherever he goes.Jonathan has worked alongside John Legend, Seth Meyers, John Oliver, and many other notable performers. He has a valid work permit, trust account, passport, and is COVID-19 Safe Sets Certified.
